text: tae puokke( puok brachheang) min bankheunh te ryytha pitabrakd nasa yeung romdaoh yk tukdei aoy( anak mean chomnue) daoy yeung kat banthoy vea( pi puok brachheang) b ndi ch mdong now krobtisati noh . haey a l laoh chea anak katsechakdei daoy kmean norna mneak achb de se th nouv kar sa me r ch robsa trong ban laey . haey trong chea anak chomnoumchomreah yeang luen bamphot
